general.question: What is KaamMila?
general.answer: KaamMila is a hyperlocal micro-job marketplace connecting people in India for quick tasks like deliveries, repairs, tutoring, and more.

general.question: How do I create an account?
general.answer: Click on 'Sign Up', provide your details, verify your email or phone number, and you're ready to go.

general.question: Is KaamMila free to use?
general.answer: Yes, browsing and applying for jobs is free. Some premium features for visibility may be introduced in the future.

general.question: How do I post a job?
general.answer: Log in, click 'Post a Job', fill in job details like category, description, location, and budget, then publish.

general.question: How do I apply for a job?
general.answer: Browse available jobs, click on the one that interests you, and hit 'Apply Now'. The employer will review your application.

general.question: Is my payment secure?
general.answer: Yes, all transactions go through secure channels. We recommend using the in-app payment feature for safety.

general.question: Can I use KaamMila outside Indore?
general.answer: Currently, KaamMila focuses on Indore but is expanding to other Indian cities soon.

general.question: How can I contact support?
general.answer: You can reach us via the 'Help & Support' section in the app or email us at support@kaammila.com.

Delivery & Pickup.question: What type of delivery jobs are available?
Delivery & Pickup.answer: You can find food delivery, parcel pickup/drop, and grocery delivery tasks.

Delivery & Pickup.question: Do I need a vehicle for delivery jobs?
Delivery & Pickup.answer: Most tasks require a bike or scooter, but some small parcel deliveries can be done on foot.

House Cleaning.question: What services are included in house cleaning?
House Cleaning.answer: Tasks may include dusting, mopping, bathroom cleaning, and kitchen deep cleaning.

House Cleaning.question: Do I need to bring my own cleaning supplies?
House Cleaning.answer: Usually, clients provide supplies, but bringing your own is always a plus.

Repairs & Maintenance.question: What kind of repair jobs can I find?
Repairs & Maintenance.answer: You can find jobs related to plumbing, electrical fixes, appliance repair, and carpentry.

Repairs & Maintenance.question: Do I need to be a certified technician?
Repairs & Maintenance.answer: Certification is not mandatory, but verified workers with skills are preferred by clients.

Tutoring & Lessons.question: What tutoring jobs are available?
Tutoring & Lessons.answer: You can find tutoring for school subjects, spoken English, coding, music, and more.

Tutoring & Lessons.question: Can I teach online?
Tutoring & Lessons.answer: Yes, you can choose either offline (in-person) tutoring or online sessions based on the student’s preference.

Pet Care.question: What kind of pet care jobs are available?
Pet Care.answer: Pet walking, feeding, grooming assistance, and short-term sitting are common tasks.

Pet Care.question: Do I need prior experience?
Pet Care.answer: Basic pet handling knowledge is required. Experience with animals is an added advantage.

Event Help.question: What event help jobs can I find?
Event Help.answer: You can find jobs like decoration setup, serving food, managing guests, and photography assistance.

Event Help.question: Are these jobs one-time only?
Event Help.answer: Yes, most event jobs are short-term or one-day tasks.

Grocery Shopping.question: How does grocery shopping work on KaamMila?
Grocery Shopping.answer: Clients share a shopping list, and workers purchase and deliver items to their doorstep.

Grocery Shopping.question: Do I need to pay upfront?
Grocery Shopping.answer: Usually, the client transfers money in advance through the app. For safety, avoid paying from your pocket.

Gardening.question: What gardening jobs are available?
Gardening.answer: Jobs may include watering plants, trimming, landscaping, and seasonal planting.

Gardening.question: Do I need to carry tools?
Gardening.answer: Most clients provide basic tools, but if you have your own, it’s beneficial.

Freelance.question: What freelance jobs are posted?
Freelance.answer: Freelance jobs include graphic design, writing, digital marketing, and web development.

Freelance.question: Can I work remotely?
Freelance.answer: Yes, freelance work is often remote and doesn’t require in-person presence.

Part-time.question: What part-time jobs are on KaamMila?
Part-time.answer: Part-time jobs include shop assistants, office helpers, receptionists, and delivery staff.

Part-time.question: What is the duration of part-time jobs?
Part-time.answer: It varies, but usually ranges from a few hours daily to weekly commitments.

Other.question: What if my job type is not listed?
Other.answer: You can post it under 'Other' and describe it clearly so workers can understand.

One-time.question: What are one-time jobs?
One-time.answer: These are single-day or single-task jobs like shifting help, installation, or small errands.
